channel.title: Hey there
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Hey there" - Miss me?

item.title: Re: Hey there
item.content:encoded:
Wonder if either of them would find me here :3

And i'll be poking your village again assuming I can get to Season 2 >.> and assuming it has room.

Do either of them still visit the site?

Still deciding if I want to re-do Alyson's whole page…I sorta forget all the page editing stuff I did before >.> and it's such a pain to maintain lol

[edit] Well I put in an application to Ordinary, and also to a village called MoonLight (I love the name :P) hopefully something comes of it.

item.title: Re: Hey there
item.content:encoded: I think naito (one of the original Wiki members) and Lear (another original Wiki) are currently running villages. Both Ancient and Ordinary. Sorry I can't get you in :(

item.title: Re: Hey there
item.content:encoded:
Maybe not, won't let me apply since I am only season 1 and not a survivor :P guess i'll just mess around as a rogue for a while or something

Evil ability not to be able to delete posts XD

item.title: Re: Hey there
item.content:encoded: Well, even if it ends up being a temporary thing…I signed up again with a new account, poked you Uzuki with a referral for it also. If you happen to find room in your village for me again, i'll be hovering around :P

item.title: Re: Hey there
item.content:encoded: Nice. I've been toying with the thought of playing again…I just dunno if it's worth it. I like to think I would stay this time but…meh. Dunno. Sometimes I miss the game, sometimes I just want to stay the heck away XD

item.title: Re: Hey there
item.content:encoded: Ya, it 'sploded. But we've got a new village, and it's got more upgrades than the old one now ^_^

item.title: Re: Hey there
item.content:encoded: I remember you :3 hehe. There's been a ton of rules changes since I was gone huh? And apparently the old wiki village went boom?

item.title: Hey there
item.content:encoded:
I wonder who still remembers me…who knows? Figure i'll poke and find out.

And no, I have no real plans to come back to the game :) but I am curious how my old village is doing. So how is everybody?
